## PDB Statistics
```{r}
#import data
p <- read.table("Data Export Summary.csv", sep = ",", header = T, row.names = 1)
#set rownames to be experimental method

#calculate percent of each type of molecule
percent <- (p$Total / sum(p$Total))*100
names(percent) <- row.names(p)
percent
```
